name: Pirate Hunter (itch) (ElbiBeck)
description:
Play as the deadly hunter. Hunting down bounties on the seas worst pirates!

Made for Pirate Jam Pre-Jam Skirmish 2020 with the theme Bounty. 

Made using Unity and Photoshop. Everything is made by me.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, and your mouse to aim and attack.

Feel free to leave feedback and/or the amount of bounties you collected.

I am not eligible for the grand prize. Email: lassebeckskole04@gmail.com Name: Lasse Beck
